markdownRemark.html:
My first blog post!

Not much to put here, really liking working with Gatsby. Been working on some retrospectives of the projects I’ve got on my resume, hoping to start this blog as sort of an extension of my resume actually, so if anyone is interested in my projects they can come read about them here.

Beyond that I’m hoping to do some write-ups of the technologies and techniques involved in those projects, like fourier analysis or OpenGL for the visualizer and the dope algorithms used in (or just related to) the YFS file system. I’ll also be putting any interesting tidbits related to future projects here. Maybe I’ll do a post about Gatsby, because although I’m sure there are already many, many such posts around, none of them are mine!
